configuration.name: widget_07131376291815446
configuration.stem: Dandelions can produce seeds by both asexual and sexual reproduction. How does this benefit the dandelion? Select all that apply.

options.name: mc-opt-item-028151441155932844
options.text: The sexually produced plants provide genetic diversity to the population.

options.name: mc-opt-item-06761015402153134x1
options.text: The asexually produced plants ensure that favorable traits are passed to the offspring.

options.name: _widget_-04096438214724045
options.text: The sexually produced plants do not complete with the asexually produced plants.

options.name: _widget_-026608200507335567
options.text: The asexually produced plants can rapidly colonize an area.
